tool_description: MoviesDatabase provides complete and updated data for over 9 million titles ( movies, series and episodes) and 11 million actors / crew and cast members
name: MoviesDatabase
title: MoviesDatabase

api_list.name: /titles/{id}/main_actors

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Imdb Id of title ex: tt0000002

api_list.name: /titles/{id}/crew

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Imdb Id of title ex: tt0000002

api_list.name: /titles/search/title/{title}

optional_parameters.name: info
optional_parameters.description: Info type structure (default: mini-info) -> base_info / mini_info / image /...

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of titles per page (default: 10) -> 10 max

api_list.name: /titles/search/keyword/{keyword}

optional_parameters.name: info
optional_parameters.description: Info type structure (default: mini-info) -> base_info / mini_info / image / ...

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of titles per page (default: 10) -> 10 max

api_list.name: /titles/search/akas/{aka}

optional_parameters.name: info
optional_parameters.description: Info type structure (default: mini-info) -> base_info / mini_info / image /...

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of titles per page (default: 10) -> 10 max

api_list.name: Search by imdb id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com/titles/tt0086250"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com/titles/{id}"

headers = {
